remarks: A ring homomorphism preserves ratios.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Oct-2017.)
statement:
rhmdvd.u $e |- U = ( Unit ` S ) $.
rhmdvd.x $e |- X = ( Base ` R ) $.
rhmdvd.d $e |- ./ = ( /r ` S ) $.
rhmdvd.m $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
rhmdvd $p |- ( ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) /\ ( ( F ` B ) e. U /\ ( F ` C ) e. U ) ) -> ( ( F ` A ) ./ ( F ` B ) ) = ( ( F ` ( A .x. C ) ) ./ ( F ` ( B .x. C ) ) ) ) $.
